abstracts.cdata!:
The Baluchistan Minor Irrigation and
            Agricultural Development Project will increase agricultural
            production through minor irrigation and command area
            development works, and the introduction of improved
            agricultural practices; improve the information base and
            institutional capacity for planning, preparing and
            implementing minor irrigation schemes, and introduce
            appropriate forms of local participation; and develop
            technical and economic criteria and specifications for
            preparation of integrated minor irrigation schemes that
            could be used in follow-up and expanded projects.
